 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==cut off== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵץ‎</span> ***end***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡aƒâƒu***</u></abbr>, ***hew off, cut off***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡iƒƒatu***</u></abbr>, ***boundary stone***, Belser<sup>BAS ii. 120, 139,</sup> compare [[BDB#Hilpr|Hilpr]]<sup>Assyriaca i. 12</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cut, clip, cut off***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְצַץ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cut off***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִיצָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***end***);-**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקַצֹּתָה‎</span> [[Deut.25.12|Deut 25:12]] (accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפָּהּ‎</span>); ***Participle pass*** plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְצוּצֵי פֵאָה‎</span> [[Jer.9.25|Jer 9:25]]; [[Jer.25.23|Jer 25:23]]; [[Jer.49.32|Jer 49:32]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֵּאָה‎</span> **1**). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצֵּץ‎</span> [[Ps.129.4|Ps 129:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְק‎</span> consecutive [[Exod.39.3|Exod 39:3]]; [[Ps.46.10|Ps 46:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצַּץ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.16|2Kgs 18:16]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְקַצֵּץ‎</span> [[2Kgs.16.17|2Kgs 16:17]] +, etc.;-***cut*** or ***hew off***, thumbs, toes, [[Judg.1.6|Judg 1:6]], hands and feet [[2Sam.4.12|2Sam 4:12]] ***cut in two***, spear (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲנִית‎</span>) [[Ps.46.10|Ps 46:10]], threads [[Exod.39.3|Exod 39:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), cords [[Ps.129.4|Ps 129:4]] (figurative); ***cut in pieces***, vessels (of gold) [[2Kgs.24.13|2Kgs 24:13]]; [[2Chr.28.24|2Chr 28:24]] bases (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּכֹנוֺת‎</span>) [[2Kgs.16.17|2Kgs 16:17]] (so [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]], transposing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּסְגְּרוֺת‎</span>), doors [[2Kgs.18.16|2Kgs 18:16]] (both, for the sake of metal sheathing). **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקֻצָּצִים‎</span> [[Judg.1.7|Judg 1:7]] ***hewn off*** (as v[[Judg.1.6|Judg 1:6]] above).
